title: Detailed info about the request
description: This object contains detailed info about performed request.

url.description: Absolute URL of the request (fragments are not included).

headersSize.description: Total number of bytes from the start of the HTTP request message until (and including) the double CRLF before the body. Set to -1 if the info is not available.

bodySize.description: Size of the request body (POST data payload) in bytes. Set to -1 if the info is not available.

comment.description: A comment provided by the user or the application.
